fields.name: Checking
fields.description: A debit account is a financial account for managing day to day transactions, offering features like a debit card, online banking, and bill payments. It allows easy access to funds for purchases, bill payments, and cash withdrawals.

fields.name: Savings
fields.description: A savings account is a secure way to save and grow money over time, offering interest on deposits and setting a goal of saving.

fields.name: Loan
fields.description: A loan account is a borrowing arrangement where money is borrowed from the bank and repaid over time with interest.
